source.value: Electronic reproduction of (manifestation): -- Supplement: Latest Paris fashions, presented to the subscribers to the Queen. -- [London, 1877-1907]. -- 118 col. plates   41 cm. -- Call number of original: NK4749 Q4

description.value: Caption title: Supplement -- The Queen, lady's newspaper and court chronicle
Page no. [11] Caption: La Mode Française, 3 Rue de la Sablière. 3. Paris / P. Orsoni Edr.
Includes photographic illustrations by Henri Manuel, Paris, of Madame Carlier hats and coats by the Paris fashion house Ch. Drecoll (plate no. [212])
Page no. [13] Caption: Reproduction interdite. Société Générale Des Journaux Professionnels Des Couturieres...
Page no. [57] Caption: Supplement to Myra's Journal. The leader of fashion. Printed in France. London. Beeton & Co. Ltd. ...
Page no. [190] Captions: The Berkeley Hotel. Piccadilly. [and] View of the Green Park and Buckingham Palace as seen from the windows of the Berkeley Hotel, Piccadilly
Page no. [202] Caption: The Restaurant. Claridges

format.value: 1 online resource (114 unnumbered leaves of plates)
